widget.name: Convert Popup To Overlay
widget.description: Convert a regular (non-modal) popup layout to overlay / drawer style.

property.caption: Overlay size
property.description: In pixels. For horizontal overlays it's a width, for vertical it's used as height.

property.caption: Show the header?
property.description: Display the pagetitle in a header

property.caption: Close button class name
property.description: The overlay cannot be closed correctly via close page only. Any button inside the overlay with this class will close the overlay animations after click.

property.caption: auto close page?
property.description: If the close button should also trigger a 'close page'. Set to false only if you want the animations to visually close the page, but have the context to still be available (if otherwise there is an issue within a mimcroflow). When this option is false, the close page action needs to happen within Mendix. The overlay is only closed visually.

property.caption: Close trigger
property.description: Attribute to have the widget be closed: If true = close overlay. Note: set this boolean to false after the overlay is closed.
